name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, Ask Haiku Reader to read me a haiku.”
”Alexa, Tell Haiku Reader to tell me a poem.”
”Alexa, Ask Haiku Reader for a haiku.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
This skill will read the user a haiku about cats when prompted.

Try saying something like:

“Alexa, Tell Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
or
“Alexa, Ask Haiku Reader for a haiku”
